technologies.name: TypeScript
technologies.description: TypeScript is an open-source language which builds on JavaScript  by adding static type definitions.

technologies.name: Facebook Login
technologies.description: Facebook Login is a way for people to create accounts and log into your app across multiple platforms.

technologies.name: Bootstrap
technologies.description: Bootstrap is a free and open-source CSS framework directed at responsive, mobile-first front-end web development. It contains CSS and JavaScript-based design templates for typography, forms, buttons, navigation, and other interface components.

technologies.name: Varnish
technologies.description: Varnish is a reverse caching proxy.

technologies.name: Angular
technologies.description: Angular is a TypeScript-based open-source web application framework led by the Angular Team at Google.

technologies.name: Google Ads
technologies.description: Google Ads is an online advertising platform developed by Google.

technologies.name: Twitter
technologies.description: Twitter is a 'microblogging' system that allows you to send and receive short posts called tweets.

technologies.name: Google Analytics
technologies.description: Google Analytics is a free web analytics service that tracks and reports website traffic.

technologies.name: Didomi
technologies.description: Didomi is a consent management platform helping brands and businesses collect, store and leverage their customer consents.

technologies.name: Adform
technologies.description: Adform is an all-in-one platform for digital advertising.

technologies.name: theTradeDesk
technologies.description: theTradeDesk is an technology company that markets a software platform used by digital ad buyers to purchase data-driven digital advertising campaigns across various ad formats and devices.

technologies.name: Twitter Ads
technologies.description: Twitter Ads is an advertising platform for Twitter 'microblogging' system.

technologies.name: Microsoft Clarity
technologies.description: Microsoft's Clarity is a analytics tool which provides website usage statistics, session recording, and heatmaps.

technologies.name: Microsoft Advertising
technologies.description: Microsoft Advertising is an online advertising platform developed by Microsoft.

technologies.name: Matomo Tag Manager
technologies.description: Matomo Tag Manager manages tracking and marketing tags.

technologies.name: Matomo Analytics
technologies.description: Matomo Analytics is a free and open-source web analytics application, that runs on a PHP/MySQL web-server.

technologies.name: LazySizes
technologies.description: LazySizes is a JavaScript library used to delay the loading of images (iframes, scripts, etc) until they come into view.

technologies.name: jQuery
technologies.description: jQuery is a JavaScript library which is a free, open-source software designed to simplify HTML DOM tree traversal and manipulation, as well as event handling, CSS animation, and Ajax.

technologies.name: core-js
technologies.description: core-js is a modular standard library for JavaScript, with polyfills for cutting-edge ECMAScript features.

technologies.name: TwicPics
technologies.description: TwicPics offers on-demand responsive image generation.

technologies.name: Google Ads Conversion Tracking
technologies.description: Google Ads Conversion Tracking is a free tool that shows you what happens after a customer interacts with your ads.

technologies.name: reCAPTCHA
technologies.description: reCAPTCHA is a free service from Google that helps protect websites from spam and abuse.

technologies.name: MailChimp
technologies.description: Mailchimp is a marketing automation platform and email marketing service.

technologies.name: HSTS
technologies.description: HTTP Strict Transport Security (HSTS) informs browsers that the site should only be accessed using HTTPS.

technologies.name: Webpack
technologies.description: Webpack is an open-source JavaScript module bundler.

technologies.name: Open Graph
technologies.description: Open Graph is a protocol that is used to integrate any web page into the social graph.

technologies.name: Module Federation
technologies.description: Module Federation is a webpack technology for dynamically loading parts of other independently deployed builds.
